price: Magsasabi ang [anghel na] kaugnay niya: “Itong taglay ko [na talaan ng mga gawa niya] ay nakalaan.”
arabic: وَقَالَ قَرِينُهُۥ هَٰذَا مَا لَدَيَّ عَتِيدٌ

version.title: Filipino (Tagalog) Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Tagalog by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: waqāla qarīnuhu hādhā mā ladayya ʿatīdun
